price: It is they who destroyed themselves, and all what they fabricated will be lost from them.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna khasirū anfusahum waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna
